thread.title: Researchers take a ride through virtual reality (University of the Sunshine Coast)
thread.title_full: Researchers take a ride through virtual reality (University of the Sunshine Coast) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Researchers take a ride through virtual reality (University of the Sunshine Coast)
text: ( Source : University of the Sunshine Coast ) Cycling enthusiasts who attend the annual Ride to USC Day breakfast on Wednesday 14 October will be able to go for a spin through virtual reality, thanks to a group of USC researchers. PhD
